In England, in the seven days to 27 June, there were 97,256 new confirmed cases (172.0 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 20 June, there were 59,325 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 64% (37,931 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 02 July is 4,218,807 (7,460.3 cases per 100,000 population).
